articles.content: Drake has called for the Grammys be replaced with something new that we can build up over time and pass on to the generations to come, after it failed to recognise his pop peer the Weeknd in any of i… [+5796 chars]

articles.title: Johnny Depp was hopeless – thank goodness Mads Mikkelsen is here to save Fantastic Beasts - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Depp's Grindelwald was both boring and bizarre: think Bowie meets Hitler. Mikkelsen's skill and gravitas is the tonic the franchise needs
articles.content: There, he excelled as dimension-hopping baddie Kaecilius, opposite Benedict Cumberbatchs Stephen Strange. Even for Marvel, Doctor Strange was a pretty wigged-out experience  the hero is a dashing sur… [+1620 chars]
